user.title: Select McIntosh Processor
user.description: Choose your processor model to begin setup. [â˜• Tip the Author](https://buymeacoffee.com/DYks67r)

connection.title: Connect to {model_name}
connection.description:
Enter the connection details for your processor.

**Network:** `socket://192.168.1.100:84`
**Serial:** `/dev/ttyUSB0` or `COM3`

zones.title: Name Your Zones
zones.description:
Your {model_name} supports {zone_count} audio zones. Give each zone a friendly name.

**Examples:** Living Room, Patio, Bedroom

data_description.main_zone_name: Name for your primary listening area

source_groups.title: Configure Input Sources
source_groups.description:
Select which input groups you want to customize. You can rename individual sources to match your connected devices.

**Tip:** You can skip this and configure later in Options.

sources_hdmi.title: Name HDMI Sources
sources_hdmi.description:
Give your HDMI inputs friendly names. Leave blank to use defaults.

**Examples:** Apple TV, Xbox, Blu-ray Player

sources_digital.title: Name Digital Audio Sources
sources_digital.description: Configure your digital audio inputs. Leave blank to use defaults.

sources_analog.title: Name Analog Sources
sources_analog.description:
Configure your analog inputs. Leave blank to use defaults.

**Examples:** Turntable, CD Player, Tape Deck

features.title: Optional Features
features.description: Choose which controls to enable. These create additional entities in Home Assistant.

data_description.enable_loudness: Switch to enable/disable loudness for low-volume listening
data_description.enable_audio_trim: Sliders to adjust bass and treble levels
data_description.enable_channel_trim: Fine-tune center, subwoofer, surrounds, and height channels
data_description.enable_lipsync: Adjust audio delay to sync with video
data_description.polling_interval: How often to check device status (lower = more responsive)

error.cannot_connect: Unable to connect. Please verify connection details and try again.
error.connection_refused: Connection refused. Check that the IP address and port 84 are correct.
error.connection_timeout: Connection timed out. Verify the device is on the network and powered on.
error.no_response: Connected but device didn't respond. Check device power and model selection.
error.permission_denied: Permission denied. Check that the user has access to the serial port.
error.unsupported: This device model is not supported.

abort.already_configured: This processor is already configured in Home Assistant.

init.title: McIntosh Options
init.description: What would you like to configure?

connection.title: Connection Settings
connection.description: Update how Home Assistant connects to your processor.

zones.title: Zone Names
zones.description: Rename your audio zones or enable/disable additional zones.

sources.title: Rename Input Sources
sources.description: Give your inputs friendly names like 'Apple TV' or 'Turntable'. Leave blank to use default names.

features.title: Features & Controls
features.description: Enable or disable optional features and adjust polling settings.
